data.actual_result: They join together and the chat window is incorrectly sized causing the window to assume chat is larger and hide a bit of chat + the pin button.
data.expected_result: They join together and the chat window is correctly sized
data.short_description: [Overlay] Pinning Chat and Server/Channel list together while Chat is on far right, causes it to expect window to be larger.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a lovely game with overlay - Open the overlay - Pin Chat + Server/Channel list together (So unpin chat from showing) - Make the window slightly large. - Unpin chat from the server/channel list. - Make Chat window small (width), and drag to far right of the screen - Pin Chat + Server/Channel list together (Again)
